item.description:
Low tide is 12:32 PM at the mouth of the river.

We'll meet across from Widows' Walk Golf course on the driftway in Scituate at 11:00AM ; plan on being in water ready to go @ 11:15AM. An easy 30 minute paddle to the Sand bar/spit. bring your lunch, towel and sun screen. And for those who want to do more paddling we'll take a small jaunt up the NORTH river from the spit.

RENTALS: If you need a rental, they are available at Buckles and Boards on rte 139 in Marshfield (about 10 minutes form the boat ramp. Another possibililty is King's Landing boat yard (on the North river) in Norwell just off rte 123; you can could paddle down from there to the spit. (45 - 60 Minutes) . Rentals are about $40.00 all equipment included.

We had a great group last time, 22 kayaks and 27 people.

Let's finish the summer on a high!

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Kayak to Scituate SPIT II
